body:
#### PR description:

Fix issues introduced by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47572, see also https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47404#issuecomment-2729459070

* No `HepMC3FilterDriver` is created in case of HepMC2 generators as not all the filters are ported yet
* The `return` statements are now outside the trial loop.

#### PR validation:

* 136.901 tau embedding step3 working now (no full test today as eos mount is gone on cmsdev43)
